comments:
It seems that the XML editor used for editing plug-in manifest source is having 
some problems when the source contains XML comments.

For instance, when I try to insert a new line right after the comment closing 
tag using the Enter key, a new line is inserted, but the cursor remains in the 
same position (it should be in the beginning of the new line), and the Error 
Log View shows two new entries. The first one contains the following stack 
trace:

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -2
	at org.eclipse.jface.text.rules.BufferedRuleBasedScanner.read
(BufferedRuleBasedScanner.java(Compiled Code))

20020924 or later.
